item.description:
How to Tell a Kick Butt 5 minute story.

Come and enjoy a 1.5 hour workshop on finding a story from your life experience with coaching and pointers on performance. Storytelling is a whole performance art unto itself.

In this workshop you will begin to learn how storytelling differs from theater, stand up and twisting balloon animals and how to mine your life experience to craft a story.

Followed by an open mic opportunity to tell your story to an audience. 5 minute stories on a theme.

Workshop Fee:  $20.00  Limited to 16 and minimum of 6 to run. A series of workshops that will be taught by two professional massmouth storytellers, who will feature with a ten minute segment at the open mic

 

Open mic starts at 8PM and is free with a $5 minimum at the venue

Or come to one of massmouth Story Slams -- three of the workshop attendees have gone on to be Slam winners!

SUN, FEB 20     Bella Luna in JP  “beasts”     

THURS, FEB 24        Point of View, Haley House Café, Roxbury

MON, MAR 13    Enormous Room Cambridge "death and taxes"   

SUN, MAR 20     Bella Luna in JP  “down and out”

MON, MAR 21    Kennedy's Midtown  Brian O'Donovan  "where I'm from"

 

APRIL 14th SEMI FINALS GALA at COOLIDGE CORNER THEATER  APRIL 26th TUE BIG MOUTH OFF at BPL RabbHall, Copley Square,Boston APRIL 30th FIRST HIGH SCHOOL STORY SLAM Cambridge Public Library  - Main

Contact massmouth tel# - 617.922.0032 www.massmouth.com
item.how_to_find_us: By Park St. T. We are in the Hardwood Room.
